description: 2x2 factorial design (Fac1: aa/bb, Fac2: cc/dd) with 3 runs - demonstrates proper stimulus file generation for factorial designs
afni_command: 3dDeconvolve -nodata 300 2 -polort -1 -num_stimts 4 -num_glt 0 -stim_label 1 Fac1.aa_Fac2.cc -stim_label 2 Fac1.bb_Fac2.cc -stim_label 3 Fac1.aa_Fac2.dd -stim_label 4 Fac1.bb_Fac2.dd -ortvec baseline_poly_2_1.1D baseline_poly_2_1 -ortvec baseline_poly_2_2.1D baseline_poly_2_2 -ortvec baseline_poly_2_3.1D baseline_poly_2_3 -ortvec constant_1.1D constant_1 -ortvec constant_2.1D constant_2 -ortvec constant_3.1D constant_3 -stim_times 1 Fac1.aa_Fac2.cc_times.1D SPMG1\(1\) -stim_times 2 Fac1.bb_Fac2.cc_times.1D SPMG1\(1\) -stim_times 3 Fac1.aa_Fac2.dd_times.1D SPMG1\(1\) -stim_times 4 Fac1.bb_Fac2.dd_times.1D SPMG1\(1\) -TR_times 1 -nofullf_atall -tout -cbucket coefout -bucket statout -x1D_stop -jobs 1 -float
execution_output: ++ 3dDeconvolve extending num_stimts from 4 to 13 due to -ortvec
++ Authored by: B. Douglas Ward, et al.
++ -stim_times using TR=2 s for stimulus timing conversion
++ -stim_times using TR=1 s for any -iresp output datasets
++ ** -stim_times NOTE ** guessing GLOBAL times if 1 time per line; LOCAL otherwise
[7m*+ WARNING:[0m '-stim_times 1' file 'Fac1.aa_Fac2.cc_times.1D' has 3 rows, but dataset has 1 time blocks
[7m*+ WARNING:[0m '-stim_times 2' file 'Fac1.bb_Fac2.cc_times.1D' has 3 rows, but dataset has 1 time blocks
[7m*+ WARNING:[0m '-stim_times 3' file 'Fac1.aa_Fac2.dd_times.1D' has 3 rows, but dataset has 1 time blocks
[7m*+ WARNING:[0m '-stim_times 4' file 'Fac1.bb_Fac2.dd_times.1D' has 3 rows, but dataset has 1 time blocks
++ Wrote matrix values to file statout.xmat.1D

results.warnings: All terms require external processing and don't contribute to the R design matrix. Returning empty design matrix.
